mapper.sql: id, uuid, title, creator_id, `date`, place, `start`, `end`, `type`, members, `desc`, instance_id, `status`, create_time
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_meeting SET uuid = #{uuid}, title = #{title}, date = #{date}, creator_id = #{creatorId},
place = #{place},
start = #{start}, end = #{end}, type = #{type}, members = #{members}, `desc` = #{desc}, instance_id = #{instanceId}, status = #{status}, create_time = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.uuid, m.title, u2.name, DATE_FORMAT(m.date, '%Y年%m月%d日') AS date, m.place, DATE_FORMAT(m.start,'%H:%i') AS start , DATE_FORMAT(m.end , '%H:%i') AS end , m.type, m.status, m.desc, u2.photo, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,CONCAT(m.date," ",m.start),CONCAT(m.date," ",m.end)) AS hour FROM tb_meeting m JOIN tb_user u1 ON JSON_CONTAINS ( m.members, CAST( u1.id AS CHAR ) ) JOIN tb_user u2 ON m.creator_id = u2.id WHERE u1.id = #{userId} AND m . status IN ( 3, 4 ) AND u1 . status = 1 AND u2 . status = 1 ORDER BY m . date, m . start, m . id LIMIT #{start}, #{length}

SELECT m.uuid, m.creator_id AS creatorId, m.title, u.name, DATE_FORMAT(m.date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date, m.place, DATE_FORMAT( m.START, '%H:%i' ) AS start , DATE_FORMAT( m.END , '%H:%i' ) AS end , m.type, m.status, m.desc, m.instance_id AS instanceId FROM tb_meeting m JOIN tb_user u ON m.creator_id = u.id WHERE m.id = #{id} AND u . status = 1
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.photo FROM tb_meeting m JOIN tb_user u ON JSON_CONTAINS(m.members, CAST(u.id AS CHAR)) WHERE m.id = #{id} AND u.status = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_meeting WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 3
mapper.select: select meet.id, u1.photo as creatorPhoto, u2.photo as approvalPhoto, (case meet.type when 1 then '在线会议' when 3 then '线下会议' end) as type, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,meet.`start`, meet.`end`) as minute, meet.date, meet.`status`, u1.`name` as creator,u2.name as approval from tb_meeting meet left join tb_user u1 on u1.id = meet.creator_id left join tb_user u2 on u2.id = #{id} where meet.instance_id = #{instanceId}
